channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gorka accuses CNN anchor of 'distorting the facts' about transgender shooters
item.description: White House counterterrorism czar Sebastian Gorka accused a CNN anchor of pushing a political agenda after she sought to downplay the number of gender...

item.title: PBS, NPR stations working to cope with -- and survive -- government funding cuts
item.description: Coping with a sudden loss in federal funding, PBS affiliate KSPS in Spokane, Washington, faced a surprise extra hurdle. Many of its contributing membe...

item.title: U.S. judge bars government from sending Guatemalan children back, for now
item.description: A U.S. judge at least temporarily blocked the government Sunday from deporting a group of Guatemalan children who had crossed the border without their...

item.title: The Ethos of the Left Is Fracturing Friendships
item.description: The postmodern left dissolves the individual into a soup of identities and communities, making sincere bonds harder to forge.

item.title: Insights from a 1949 Guide for Housewives
item.description: What could I learn from a book directed at ‘the newcomer to running a home’?

item.title: Goodbye, August
item.description: At every age, I’ve tried to squeeze more and more out of Augusts that somehow seem to pass in a few flashes rather than languid weeks.

item.title: Rudy Giuliani injured in New Hampshire car wreck
item.description: Former New York City Mayor Rudolph W. Giuliani was hospitalized Saturday after getting seriously injured in a car accident in New Hampshire.

item.title: Read This, Not That: Back-to-School Edition
item.description: NR writers propose alternatives to the usual fare found on schools’ required reading lists.

item.title: A Decade After Merkel’s Refugee Gamble
item.description: The former German chancellor’s call to action reshaped Europe’s politics, and the crisis remains unresolved ten years later.

item.title: Judge halts migrant children's deportation just as planes were loading up
item.description: A federal judge ordered the Trump administration to pull juvenile migrants off deportation flights Sunday, saying it appeared the government was tryin...

item.title: 20 Years Later, New Orleans Triumphs Over Hurricane Katrina’s Tragedy
item.description: The way the citizens of New Orleans united to restore their home and regain their destiny should serve as an inspiration to us all.

item.title: Lee Corso Epitomizes The Spectacle Of Modern College Football
item.description: On Saturday, Lee Corso will make his final appearance on College GameDay , the ESPN show he has worked for since its inception in 1987.

item.title: Christian Baker Pleads For SCOTUS To End California’s Lawfare Against Her Religious Beliefs
